title: Party invitation
author: JamesM

comments.content:
Schwarzwald Regular ~ German for Black Forest ~ it's a free font

[http://www.free-fonts.com/font/schwarzwald.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132351/http:/www.free-fonts.com/font/schwarzwald.html "http://www.free-fonts.com/font/schwarzwald.html")
That's it. Looks like the same font with 2 different names. Thanks to both of you!
